page.title: 14CHURCHES IN TREGONY
page.content: THERE ARE 3 CHURCHES IN TREGONY, ST.CUBY WHICH IS THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND, BUT IS OUT OF OUR SURVEY AREA, THE CONGREGATIONAL CHURCH AND THE METHODIS CHURCH. THE CONGREGATIONAL CHURCH IS A 160 YEARS OLD AND THE AVERAGE ATTENDANCE IS 12. IT THE ONLY CONGREGATIONAL CHURCH IN CORNWALL. IT WAS FORMED WHEN PEOPLE BROKE AWAY FROM THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND . THE METHODIST CHURCH IS UNDER THE REV. COLEMAN.THERE IS 1 SERVICE A WEEK ON A SUNDAY MORNING.IT HOLDS COFFEE MORNINGS REGULARLY. THERE ARE 4 STEWARDS IN CHARGE OF ITS UP KEEP AND A ROTA OF LADIES PROVIDE FLOWERS.IT IS OVER A 100 YEARS OLD AND HAS A SUNDAY SCHOOL. THERE ARE 30 MEMBERS. THE SUNDAY SCHOOL HAS 13 PUPILS AND 2 TEACHERS.
